title: Char-Broil Digital Electric Smoker with  SmartChef Technology
description:
The Digital Electric Smoker with SmartChef™ Technology makes it easier than ever to make perfectly cooked smoked meals without being time consuming.

model # 15202043

SmartChef™ technology enables you to consistently create superior tasting food and enjoy an effortless smoking routine. The Wi-Fi connected Digital Electric Smoker with SmartChef™ Technology gives you more convenience and freedom than ever before.
Get real time cooking info anytime, anywhere and experience cooking freedom
Get notifications at key cooking times and never worry
A library of recipes at your fingertips for endless inspiration

asset.author: Char-Broil Grills

transcripts: This is what authentic smokey, tender, and juicy barbecue looks like and this is what it looks like to cook it yourself. Smart and easy. Introducing the new Char-Broil digital electric smoker with smart chef technology. Now you can sync your smoker with any compatible smart device to enhance your outdoor cooking experience. Get real time cooking info anytime anywhere. Cooking freedom. Receive notifications at key cooking times and never worry. find a library of pre-programmed recipes at your finger tips. Endless inspiration. Your smoker's heat is digitally controlled so it always stays at the right temperature. The smart meat probe ensures your food is always perfectly cooked. The Char-Broil smart Chef app lets you monitor cooking time, meat temperature, and chamber temperature. Everything you need to be confident you cook is going perfectly. your devices use WiFi to connect to the internet. Your smartphone sends data to the cloud to your smoker. Your WiFi enabled smoker sends your info back to the phone so you always know what's going on with your cook. At Char- Broil we've been innovating outdoor cooking since 1948. Along the way we've listened to you and learned about the features you need to cook with confidence. The digital electric smoker offers the capacity to feed the entire team or prepare meals for the whole week. The super size smoke box has the capacity to cover the longest cook. So you can focus on other activities. Prep and clean are quick with four removable stainless steel racks. The interior parts and grease tray come out with no tools required and they're dishwasher safe. The Char-Broil digital electric smoker with smart chef technology. Simply a better way to smoke.
